author: Themba Sepotokele
text: I had an opportunity to work with @JosCharle @SowetanLIVE during my days as a journalist and @ThaboMasebe @GautengProvince while I became spokesperson. Both fine, humble and down to earth gentlemen. @npclub @GautengPremier https://t.co/dJAADm0S7o

author: Themba Sepotokele
text: 🤣🤣🤣 Incuding Tony Factor. Actually, when John Orr folded, Stuttafords became the place to shop. 🤞🏽🤞🏽🤞🏽 https://t.co/lDFSdvaDgc

author: Themba Sepotokele
text:
Astute Communicator. No lies. No spin bu clear, crisp and concise. Always on point. 
@SputnikRatau https://t.co/hz2R4PYuE0

author: Themba Sepotokele
text: Kudo's to @SowetanLIVE team too for giving space to Mdu & Motaletale to honor and celebrate #RIPThaboMasebe

author: Themba Sepotokele
text: I dare those who are often lampooning and lambasting @SundayTimesZA obituary editor @ChrisBarron for his robust obituaries. Today, those who often throw mud at for telling like it is, penned a brilliant and honest one about #RIPThaboMasebe.

author: Themba Sepotokele
text: How three Sunday South African publications covered the untimely passing of Thabo Masebe? @SundayTimesZA  outclassed, outfoxed and outdid both @City_Press  &  @SundayIndy. Thanks team Sunday Times for giving the self-taught master political communicator the coverage he deserves. https://t.co/Rzfv4hy1Yb

author: Themba Sepotokele
text: Yesterday we bid farewell to a selfless human being, about ethical public servant and revered, respected and renowned communicator #RIPThaboMasebe, who laid a foundation for thousands of government communicators. https://t.co/PnpKpgQnZE
